title: FS:  T206 - HOF & Common, Graded and Raw

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 - HOF & Common, Graded and Raw
posts.post_content:
FS:  Assortment of T206 cards - graded and raw, HOFs and commons.  All prices are delivered.  Check, MO or PayPal ("money owed").  PayPal address is "Edwolf1963@aol.com"  PM, Post or EMail - first.  Thanks!


  * Chief Bender (No Trees), PSA4, P50-460 (Fact 25) **SOLD**
  * Sam Crawford (Throwing), PSA4, P150 - **SOLD**
  * Eddie Collins, PSA4.5, P350 - **SOLD**
  * Heinie Wagner (Bat/Right), PSA4, P350 - **SOLD**
  * Red Kleinow (NY w/Bat), PSA3, P150 - **SOLD**
  * Mike Donlin (Fielding), PSA3, P150 - **SOLD**

  * Geo Bell (Hands/head), SGC50, P350 - $50
  * Germany Schaefer (Wash), SGC40, PB - **SOLD**

  * Harry Covaleski, SGC40, P150 - $50
  * Geo Hunter, SGC40, P350 - $35 **SOLD**

  * Joe Lake (No Ball), SGC40, P350 - $38
  * Mullen (Raw), P350, crease - $20
  * Jones (Raw), P350 (I have no idea what happened to this card, color patches, name off of it!) - **SOLD**

  * J Tannehill (Raw), Pied (paper loss on back), $17
  * Barbeau (Raw), P350 (creases) - **SOLD**

  * Doyle (Raw), SC350-460, Fact 42 (creases. paper loss) - $15
  * Gibson (Raw) E-91 (paper loss) - **SOLD**
Hey Ed- I'll take the Crawford PSA 4 if available. Thanks.
I'll take the Collins if available. PM sent.
